channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-15693] Reconsider the ImportOrder rule of checkstyle
item.description:
I have been confused many times with the wrong import order checkstyle warnings in the pre commit result. And I haven't found any developer guide which tells me what is the right order so this time I decided to read the rule by myself.

In the ImportOrder section, we declare sortStaticImportsAlphabetically which can only work with option 'top' or 'bottom'(which means place static imports on top or bottom) and use the default option which is 'under'.

I prefer placing static import on top, so I suggest here we set option to 'top'.
item.summary: Reconsider the ImportOrder rule of checkstyle

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: Set option to top.
stack Sean Busbey PTAL. Thanks.

-1 overall

How does this impact the checkstyle warning count of the current codebase?
I believe eclipse puts the static imports at top. +1.

+1

Be careful config'ing checkstyle. I've not had good luck with it. Build was broke on commit. Easy to check for post-commit.

Sean Busbey Only master? Seems the checkstyle.xml in other branches are different from the one in master?

Thanks.
Duo Zhang I don't see why we'd have different checkstyle on different branches other than by oversight. Suggest applying master checkstyle everywhere we do checkstyle.

Fine. Let me replace checkstyle.xml on all branches.

Thanks stack.
Replace checkstyle.xml with the one on master.
filed HBASE-15701 for precommit not running checkstyle when the checkstyle.xml file changes.

This is broken on branch-1.1

[INFO] Generating "Checkstyle" report           --- maven-checkstyle-plugin:2.13:checkstyle

...

[ERROR] Failed to execute goal org.apache.maven.plugins:maven-site-plugin:3.4:site (default-site) on project hbase: Error generating maven-checkstyle-plugin:2.13:checkstyle: Failed during checkstyle configuration: cannot initialize module TreeWalker - Property 'sortStaticImportsAlphabetically' in module ImportOrder does not exist, please check the documentation -> [Help 1]

The checkstyle version of master is 2.17.

Let's upgrade the version for all branches?

Duo Zhang That could do it.

Sean Busbey Chris Nauroth is there a way we can add arbitrary mvn flags to a yetus precommit build? In this case, I think precommit missed the breaking change because -Prelease was not applied.
Fine, let me file a new issue.

  • CHANGES.txt

Sean Busbey Chris Nauroth is there a way we can add arbitrary mvn flags to a yetus precommit build? In this case, I think precommit missed the breaking change because -Prelease was not applied.

Yep!

If you take a look at the 'personality_modules' function in our precommit personality, it passes '-DHBasePatchProcess' to all tests and also '-PrunAllTests' to the unit test plugin (ref 1, ref 2).

We could either send '-Prelease' for checkstyle similar to how we do the unit-test-specific change, or we could send it to everything.

Fine, let me file a new issue.

Since it's been reverted from 1.1.* and it was proposed to file a new issue, I'm resolving this one again and removing 1.1.* fix version. Let me know if you'd still prefer to have backport patch for 1.1.* here.
